fields.name: Crocodile Leather Armor
fields.desc: While wearing this armor fashioned from crocodile skin, you gain a +1 bonus to AC. In addition, you can hold your breath for 15 minutes, and you have a swimming speed equal to your walking speed.

fields.name: Crocodile Hide Armor
fields.desc: While wearing this armor fashioned from crocodile skin, you gain a +1 bonus to AC. In addition, you can hold your breath for 15 minutes, and you have a swimming speed equal to your walking speed.
